Woz Weighs In On Pirates Of Silicon Valley

24 Jun 1999

Steve Wozniak has posted his comments on the TNT movie, "Pirates or Silicon Valley" in which he is a featured character. This news was originally posted on Slashdot.

Related: Upside has two takes on the made-for-TV geekfest.
